traits.name: Punishment
traits.desc: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) bludgeon damage.

traits.name: Blessing of the divines
traits.desc: If you hit with an attack during this turn, choose a creature within 15 ft. of you. That creature gains 2 temporary hit points that last for up to 10 minutes.
